languages.text: {n}Среди кланов моторных вандалов разошелся слух о поставке тяжелого оружия, потерянной между двумя ульями. В пустошах разгорелось трехдневное сражение за право обладания семью бронированными фурами, чей груз способен взломать оборону любого улья. Когда обескровленные победители вскрыли обшивку фур, они нашли лишь отряд разъяренных тремя циклами сидения в духоте и темноте блюстителей.{/n}

{n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives was spread among the Engine Vandals clans. A fight over seven armoured trucks, rumoured to contain cargo that would provide enough firepower to breach the defences of any hive, broke out in the wastelands. When the depleted winners had finally cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight, dark spaces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Среди кланов моторных вандалов разошелся слух о поставке тяжелого оружия, потерянной между двумя ульями. В пустошах разгорелось трехдневное сражение за право обладания семью бронированными фурами, чей груз способен взломать оборону любого улья. Когда обескровленные победители вскрыли обшивку фур, они нашли лишь отряд разъяренных тремя циклами сидения в духоте и темноте блюстителей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives had been spread among the Engine Vandals clans. A fight for seven armoured trucks with cargo that would allow to break through the defences of any hive has broken out in the wastelands. When the depleted winners have cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of Enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight and dark spaces.

languages.text: {n}关于某种重型武器货运车队的传言，在引擎破坏者的诸多氏族之间迅速传播开来。谣言称，废土上出现了七辆装甲车，这些装甲车负责运输威力强大的武器，足以突破任何巢都防御。为了争夺这些货物，引擎破坏者之间爆发了剧烈的战斗。当筋疲力尽的获胜者终于切开装甲车的车皮时，等待他们的却只有一队执法者。这些战士已经在阴暗、狭窄的车厢里枯坐了整整三个周期，此刻正怒气冲冲，手痒难耐。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives was spread among the Engine Vandals clans. When the depleted winners had finally cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight, dark spaces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un rumor sobre un cargamento de armas pesadas que se había perdido en algún lugar entre dos colmenas se extendió entre los clanes de los Vándalos del Motor. Se desató una lucha por siete camiones blindados en los páramos que, según los rumores, contenían armas capaces de atravesar las defensas de cualquier colmena. Cuando los mermados vencedores por fin llegaron al interior de los camiones, lo único que les esperaba era un escuadrón de guardias, enfurecidos por los tres ciclos que pasaron sentados en un espacio estrecho y oscuro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives was spread among the Engine Vandals clans. A fight over seven armoured trucks, rumoured to contain cargo that would provide enough firepower to breach the defences of any hive, broke out in the wastelands. When the depleted winners had finally cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight, dark spaces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}大砲の積荷が2か所のハイヴ間のどこかで紛失したという噂が、エンジン破壊者の一族の間で広まっていた。ウエストランドでは7台の装甲トラックを巡る争奪戦が勃発していて、いずれのハイブの防衛線も突破できるほどの射撃能力のある積荷が積まれていると噂されていた。武器を使い果たし、最終的にトラックの覆いを切り開いた勝者たちを待ち構えていたのは、狭くて暗いスペースに3サイクルも座らせられ、激怒したエンフォーサーの分隊だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives was spread among the Engine Vandals clans. When the depleted winners had finally cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight, dark spaces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Selon une rumeur circulant parmi les clans de Vandales mécaniques, une cargaison d'armes lourdes se serait perdue quelque part entre deux ruches. Un combat pour mettre la main sur sept camions blindés a alors éclaté dans les terres dévastées... Apparemment, ils contiendraient une puissance de feu suffisante pour franchir les défenses de n'importe quelle ruche. Quand le camp victorieux, exsangue, a réussi enfin à ouvrir l'un des camions, la seule chose qui les attendait à l'intérieur était une escouade de prévôts, rendus fous par trois cycles complets à rester assis dans un espace aussi sombre que confiné.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives was spread among the Engine Vandals clans. A fight over seven armoured trucks, rumoured to contain cargo that would provide enough firepower to breach the defences of any hive, broke out in the wastelands. When the depleted winners had finally cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight, dark spaces.{/n}

Apparemment, ils contiendraient une puissance de feu suffisante pour franchir les défenses de n'importe quelle ruche. languages.text: {n}Unter den Clans der Maschinenvandalen wurde das Gerücht gestreut, das irgendwo zwischen zwei Makropolen eine Lieferung schwerer Waffen verschwunden sei. Im Ödland kam es daraufhin zu einem Kampf um sieben gepanzerte Transporter, deren Ladung ausreichend Feuerkraft besitzt, um die Verteidigung jeder Makropole zu durchbrechen.. Als die dezimierten Gewinner die Transporter endlich aufgebrochen hatten, wartete darin nur ein Truppe Enforcer auf sie, mit ordentlich Wut im Bauch, weil sie seit drei Zyklen in der engen Dunkelheit hatten sitzen müssen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives was spread among the Engine Vandals clans. A fight over seven armoured trucks, rumoured to contain cargo that would provide enough firepower to breach the defences of any hive, broke out in the wastelands. When the depleted winners had finally cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight, dark spaces.{/n}

Im Ödland kam es daraufhin zu einem Kampf um sieben gepanzerte Transporter, deren Ladung ausreichend Feuerkraft besitzt, um die Verteidigung jeder Makropole zu durchbrechen.. Als die dezimierten Gewinner die Transporter endlich aufgebrochen hatten, wartete darin nur ein Truppe Enforcer auf sie, mit ordentlich Wut im Bauch, weil sie seit drei Zyklen in der engen Dunkelheit hatten sitzen müssen.

{n}Unter den Maschinenvandalen-Clans wurde das Gerücht gestreut, das irgendwo zwischen zwei Makropolen eine Ladung schwerer Waffen verschwunden sei. Im Ödland ist ein Kampf um die sieben gepanzerten Transporter ausgebrochen, deren Ladung angeblich genügend Feuerkraft besitzt, um die Verteidigung einer jeden Makropole zu durchbrechen. Als die dezimierten Gewinner die Transporter endlich aufgebrochen hatten, wartete darin nur ein Truppe Enforcers auf sie, mit ordentlich Wut im Bauch, weil sie seit drei Zyklen in der engen Dunkelheit hatten sitzen müssen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir ağır silah teslimatının iki kovan arasında bir yerlerde kaybolduğuna dair bir söylenti, Makine Vandalları klanları arasında yayıldı. Söylentiye göre tüm kovanların savunmalarını aşmaya yetecek kadar ateş gücü sunan kargonun taşındığı yedi zırhlı araç için çorak topraklarda mücadele verildi. Bitkin düşen galipler, araçların kargo kısmını açtıklarında o daracık karanlık alanda üç döngüdür oturmaktan küplere binmiş infazcıların oluşturduğu bir manganın kendilerini beklediğini gördüler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A rumour about a heavy weapon shipment getting lost somewhere between two hives was spread among the Engine Vandals clans. A fight over seven armoured trucks, rumoured to contain cargo that would provide enough firepower to breach the defences of any hive, broke out in the wastelands. When the depleted winners had finally cut open the trucks' lining, the only thing waiting there for them was a squad of enforcers, enraged by three cycles of sitting in tight, dark spaces.{/n}
